headline: Intuit to Host Investor Day on September 18, 2025
summary: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., November 25, 2024--Intuit (Nasdaq: INTU), the global financial technology platform that makes Intuit TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, and Mailchimp, will hold its annual Investor Day on September 18, 2025 at its headquarters in Mountain View, CA. The half-day event will include presentations from senior company leaders and can be viewed live at https://investors.intuit.com/news-events/ir-calendar.

headline: Intuit Q1 Earnings Beat on Online Growth, Revenues Rise 10% Y/Y
summary: INTU's Q1 results showcase digital strength with 20% online growth, while desktop revenues decline 17% amid the transition.

headline: Intuit rolls out AI QuickBooks enhancements as CEO eyes AI agents
summary: The upgrades to QuickBooks come as the firm targets AI agents that could potentially replace CFOs and other executives in the C-suite, the CEO said.
